subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Tom Boonen of Belgium broke away from the pack about 10 miles from the finish Sunday and comfortably won the Paris-Roubaix race, one of cycling’s toughest classics, for the third time. Filippo Pozzato of Italy was 47 seconds behind, and Thor Hushovd of Norway was third, 1 minute 17 seconds back.
